Text: Is this one of the working torrents for WW? I DL'd the non-working one from 2005 and was none too happy about that, if anyone has this please seed.

However, its dubbed, but if you can stand the awful voices, you have yourself Words Worth.

why does it only  have 5 episodes?!  minus the hentai portions, this could have been a great anime series...  the storyline just had me to the very end, and now i want more.  damn you Japan!  make more!  lol
